images.filename: Archie Americana Best_All in the Game.pdf-001.webp
source: OH,ARCHIE,I'M SO EXCITED I CAN HARDLY WAIT!
JUST THINK! IN ONLY 29 MINUTES THE ED SULLIVAN TV SHOW WILL COME ON!
AND WE'LL HAVE A FRONT ROW SEAT TO HEAR "THE TERMITES FIVE"!
JUST THE MENTION OF THEIR NAME TINGLES My SPINE OH, HOW SWEET IT IS!
target: 哦，阿奇，我太兴奋了，简直等不及了！
想想看！再过 29 分钟，埃德·沙利文的电视节目就要开播了！
我们将坐在前排聆听白蚁五人组的演唱！
光是提到他们的名字，我的脊背就一阵发麻，哦，多么美妙！
最初发表于 1964 年 9 月的《欢笑》第 162 期

images.filename: Archie Americana Best_All in the Game.pdf-002.webp
source: YOUR STEREO'S ON THE FRITZ, RONNIE!
I THINK THE AMPLIFIER SHORTED OUT! THE SET'S NOT GETTING THE JUICE! IF I HAD SOME TOOLS...
GooD! SEE IF HE HAS AN INSULATED SCREWDRIVER AND PLIERS!
BOY! THIS WIRING LOOKS LIKE SPAGHETTI!
HAND ME THAT INSULATED SCREWDRIVER,_RONNIE! I DON'T WANT TO GET A SHOCK WHILE POKING AROUND IN THIS MESS !
target: 你的立体声音响坏了，罗妮！
我觉得放大器短路了！这设备接收不到信号！要是我有一些工具……
太好了！看看他有没有绝缘螺丝刀和钳子！
天哪！这线路看起来像意大利面条！
把那把绝缘螺丝刀递给我，罗妮！我可不想在这一团乱麻中触电！

images.filename: Archie Americana Best_All in the Game.pdf-003.webp
source: YEAH! BUT I CAN'T FIGURE HOW THIS WiRE iS LEFY OVER!?
NOW TO ENJOY THE FRUITS OF MY LABOR LET'S PLAY" I GET A KICK OUT OF YOU"!
I CAN'T LETGO.. I CAN'T LET GO
target: 是的！但我搞不懂为什么多出了这根线？
现在来享受我的劳动成果，让我们放一首《我为你痴狂》！

images.filename: Archie Americana Best_All in the Game.pdf-004.webp
source: THAT'S A VERY HIGH FIDELITY SET YOU HAVE THERE, RONNIE! MY TOES WERE WIGGLING AT 20,000 CYCLES!
LUCKY I WASN'T PLAyING A StEREO RECORD...I MIGHT HAVE BEEN SPLIT IN TWO.
IT'S ONE MINUTE BEFORE ED SULLIVAN'S PROGRAM!
ARCHIE, WILL YOU PLEASE TELL ME WHAT'S WRONG now?
YOU FORGOT TO PUT THE_PLUG BACK IN ! REMEMBER?
target: 罗妮，你这套设备的保真度非常高！我的脚趾头在以20000赫兹的频率抖动！
幸好我没放立体声唱片……不然我可能会被分成两半。
离埃德·沙利文的节目还有一分钟！
阿奇，你现在能不能告诉我到底怎么了？
你忘了把插头插回去！记得吗？

images.filename: Archie Americana Best_All in the Game.pdf-005.webp
source: AND NOW, FOLKS WE HAVEA REALLY GREAT SHEW FOR YOU THIS EVENING ...
WE HAVE ON OUR SHEW TONIGHT TRULY SENSATIONAL ACT!
It HAS. TO BE THE ANTENNA!
WHATEVER HAPPENED TO THE PUSH-BUTTON Age?
target: 现在，朋友们，今晚我们为您带来一场真正精彩的演出……
今晚我们的节目中有一场真正轰动的表演！
别光站在那儿，阿奇！做点什么！快点！

images.filename: Archie Americana Best_All in the Game.pdf-006.webp
source: ARCHIE SHOULD BE HERE! THIS.IS SO ELECTRIFYING!
P-PULL THE PLUG.. P-PULL THE P-PLUG!!
target: 阿奇应该在这里！这太刺激了！
